original_title: Hambantota District final results; NPP wins 5 seats
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Hambantota District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 66% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 234,083 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 52,170 votes (14.79%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 05 seats in the district while the SJB and the SLPP have won a seat each in the district.
